Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Monastic Archer Stance], are wielding a bow, and have a free hand.

Snatching an arrow out of the air, you instantly put it to your bow and return fire. When you successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Deflect Arrow]{Deflect an Arrow} as part of that reaction you can immediately make a ranged bow Strike by firing the arrow you deflected from your own bow.
